User’s Manual¶

CLI¶

Options¶

-h, --help help
-y, --year set year
-m, --month set month
-d, --day set day
-D, --date set date
-Y, --yesterday
 set date to yesterday
-L, --lastmonth
 set month to last month

Note

The date given via -D is parsed directly into date. So simulating the option -Y via -D yesterday is absolutely possible.

Commands¶

<number> <description>
appends a work <description> with the duration of <number>
<from>-<to> <description>
appends a work <description> in the period from <from> to <to> where both are date valid time strings.
parse

parse the protocol related to the month set

The file named Arbeitszeiten_<YY-MM>.xlsx will be placed in the working directory

report
parse the protocol related to the month set and send the xlsx file to a configured mail address
undo
remove the last entry in the month’s protocol to which the date is set

Configuration¶

As with version 0.1a all configuration is hard coded. Changes are to be made in the shell script. See Developer’s Manual for details.
